articles.title: Cash with public falls by Rs 83,242 cr after RBI move to withdraw Rs 2,000 note - The Indian Express
articles.description: Currency with the public is arrived at after deducting cash with banks from total currency in circulation. Currency in circulation refers to cash or currency within a country that is physically used to conduct transactions.
